text: Johan Lind (born 9 January 1942) is a Norwegian speed skater. He was born in Mosjøen and represented the club Hamar IL. He competed in the 500 m at the 1968 Winter Olympics in Grenoble, and at the 1972 Winter Olympics in Sapporo. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:People from Vefsn Category:Norwegian male speed skaters Category:Olympic speed skaters of Norway Category:Speed skaters at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Speed skaters at the 1972 Winter Olympics
title: Johan Lind
